About
About
- I’m a Doctoral candidate at the Bayes Business School. My research explores the area of organisation transformation and change. Additionally, I also explore the role that social networks play in making organisation and teams change ready.
- Of particular interest to me is studying change and transformation in high growth ventures (start-ups).
- I’m a Doctoral candidate at the Bayes Business School. My research explores the area of organisation transformation and change. We were honoured to be part of the UK-Karnataka innovation roundtable, showcasing tech that drives real world impact.

Thank you to theandfor hosting and supporting global collaboration.

…more
British High Commission in India
British High Commission in India
88,599 followers
88,599 followers
UK and Karnataka are harnessing the power of AI and cleantech to tackle global challenges – from sustainability to digital inclusion. At a roundtable co-hosted by the British Deputy High Commission in Bengaluru and, 15 cutting-edge start-ups from both regions showcased breakthrough solutions shaping a smarter, greener future.

As a proud Global Innovation Alliance partner, the UK is committed to supporting Karnataka’s thriving innovation ecosystem - driving inclusive growth, creating jobs, and enabling cross-border tech partnerships that deliver real-world impact.

Kabir was a student of mine and I am happy to write this recommendation for him. As a student, Kabir proved to be a sincere, dedicated and hardworking individual.
